name: Mario Kondo Bizzarre Adventure
description:
Attention, ALL MARIE KONDO FANS.

The consultant is in great danger, and she needs YOUR help to be able to order the customer's house. To do this, she needs throw away the clothes 👖 that the customer does not like and do not throw away the one he likes👕. To help her, all she needs is download this free game, and get 💯 points on the level. But you gotta be quick so that Marie Kondo can can please the customer before the 60 seconds run out⏱️, and achieve the epic victory 💥R O Y AL💥

Controls: WASD to move Marie Kondo
Right Mouse Button: Get clothing (If the weight doesn't exceed the maximum)
Left Mouse Button: Drop the clothing to it's original position
E: A guide to the nearest bad clothing(20 seconds of cooldown)
Touch the rubber to drop all the clothing that Marie is carrying and add the score

PS: A university project of 48 hours
